website_summaries.verdict: Although the Gold Armour may share many of the same features of its competitors, this toilet light stands apart because it is actually waterproof.
pros: Flexible arm effortlessly fits all toilets
cons: Requires 3 AAA batteries, yet they are not included with this toilet light

customer_reviews.title: Rave. 4am. in the bathroom.

The best part is gathering the reactions of your friends, like: "woah dude! Your toilet is glowing!! Where'd you get it?!" ... Define "it", George.. The potty? Or the magic?!

It will go off if you open the door, but if you walk towards the toilet ( door open was already open), you have to get pretty close to activate it. A few times even with opening the door it didn't go off until I was at the toilet.I love how it shuts off automatically. I might buy another one for my other toilet.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I love it! My son loves it! Our guests love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I love it! My son loves it! Our guests love it! We have a Star Wars theme throughout the house, so glowing light coming from anywhere actually fits really well with our decor. I can tell you it has helped my son pee inside the bowl in the middle of the night. I have to clean less now. Yay! Win/win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Eivi Widas

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried a few lights, but this one is the best
customer_reviews.text: So this may or may not sound odd, but I have tried different toilet lights in search for the best one and I finally found it with this one. There was always something that didn’t live up to expectations with the other ones I’ve had. With this one, it met and exceeded my expectations. Why? The light sequence transitions smoothly, the actual product looks much more refined than its competitors, the motion sensor is perfectly sensitive, and it turns back off within a reasonable time frame. Many seemed to fail in one or more. So if you decide to get a toilet night light, this is the nicest and most intelligently designed one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: It will help you immensely if you thoroughly read the directions. Being able to recognize how to turn on and turn off Toilet Night Light is important. I have found that the night lights that use AA Batteries are much more dependable versus the ones that take AAA batteries. They seem to be built a little more sturdy. After installing batteries, I though the night lights were Dead on Arrival. But after a quick read through the directions, I just never had them turned on properly. Can cautiously recommend this brand, I have purchased before and they lasted a good 2 years with the original batteries... But good luck...

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Update from June 2019: I have had this light for less than 3 months. Color changed from blue to a sickly green, and then became red. I put in fresh batteries, but no change. I have followed the printed directions, but all 14 of the other colors have disappeared or burned out. This is the second one of these lights that I have purchased, and the first one did the same thing. I bought this one, assuming the first one wore out after a year or so. Will NOT buy another one!

I would definitely recommend this product but as a future product suggestion I think you should eliminate red as one of the colors because red in a toilet can be scary.
